channel.title: Windows on Wandering Thoughts
channel.description: Recent content in Windows on Wandering Thoughts

item.title: Testing in multiple versions of IE
item.description: Internet Explorer is the bane of every web developer's existence. What makes it worse is how difficult Microsoft makes it to test sites in different versions of IE.

item.title: Making the Windows Command Prompt Usable
item.description: Compared to *nix based systems, the windows command prompt is a joke. If you're stuck on windows, here are some tips to make the command line experience a little less painful.
